32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Abdullah b. Muti' who heard from his father and said:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) say on the day of the Conquest of Mecca: No Quraishite will be killed hound hand and foot from this day until the Day of judgment

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يُقْتَلُ قُرَشِيٌّ صَبْرًا بَعْدَ الْفَتْحِ
chapter.eng-name: No man if Quraish is to be captured then killed, after the conquest
